name: Diamond Sea Hotel
detail: From airport to hotel taken around 18 mins by taxi. The beach I front of the hotel which you can have 180 degree Sea view if book a room with sea view. Unfortunately When I booked with Agoda, there is no mentioning about the room type, our room was no view, just face to a wall. And the drains of the sink was way too slow, seems something blocked. The best thing was no noise from outside even our room just fight in front of the elevator. We have a great trip in Da Nang.
area: Phước Mỹ,Da Nang - View on map

name: M HOTEL DANANG
detail: M hotel is wonderful in every way possible, we will be back
area: Phước Mỹ,Da Nang - View on map

name: Golden Lotus Grand Da Nang
detail: Amazing location, staff, services and facilities.
area: Phước Mỹ,Da Nang - View on map

name: Dylan Hotel Danang
detail: I just wanna express how happy and grateful I was during my recent 3 days staying (with 3 of my grand-children) at the Dylan Hotel. The hotel is 5 min walk to the beach and located on a busy street with various types of stores, restaurants, health spas... Breakfast menu was good. We were satisfied with the hotel/room cleanliness. All the hotel workers (front desk, room service people, waitresses...) were nice and helpful. I was impressed with their hospitality and services which was exceeding my expectation. I’ve made multiple inquiries about the local area on various topics. Special thanks to the two young receptionists - Ms. Trinh, Ms. Khuong - all of my questions were answered. They are so kind, knowledgeable and patient, always treating their hotel guests with respected polite manners. I would come back to stay in this very same hotel again and again whenever I happen to be in Da Nang.
area: Phước Mỹ,Da Nang - View on map

name: DLG Hotel Danang
detail: A lot of positives with this hotel: 1. Location is right on the beach. There are a few clusters of big hotels on the beach, and this once actually sits in between the clusters, so the part of the beach is less busy than most. 2. 2 swimming pools, one on the ground floor, one on the third floor. Both are excellent. 3. Good value for money. Rooms are clean, service is good.
area: Phước Mỹ,Da Nang - View on map

name: Muong Thanh Luxury Da Nang hotel
detail: My Group 14paxs booked 6 rooms. All rooms are spacious, clean, cosy, comfortable, well-furnished with ocean view. Impressed by fast services checking in/out. Fairly new nice beachfront hotel with excellent ocean view. 40th floor provided excellent city and ocean views. Staff always helpful, delightful and proficient in English. No communication issue. Swimming pool is large with brilliant views. Breakfast has lot of selections. We thanked and extended our great appreciation to staff, Mr Le Quang Vinh, who constantly went above and beyond his duties to ensure we were satisfied, happy and made all relevant infrastructure arrangements for us. We got free upgrade to Grand Suite Room which is very spacious with ocean view. Great job to all the staff and Muong Thanh Luxury Da Nang Hotel. Overall we had a great experience and enjoyable times staying in this hotel. We truly enjoyed our stay here and we surely will come back.
area: Phước Mỹ,Da Nang - View on map

name: Sandy Beach Non Nuoc Resort
detail: i wanted to stay in da nang resort in such a way that i can enjoy fantastic beach. sandy beach resort was one of them. however when i reached, the resort seems to be a ghost town. not sure the reason though the staff mentioned the rooms are all booked. another problem for a late night party guy like me was that the restaurant on the beach front got closed by 9pm. it was bit surprise to me. breakfast was okish. rooms were neat and clean. however the resort is pretty far from the centre of Da nang city. and there is only one shuttle bus offering from the resort to the centre of the city. and it is too early in the morning. ie. 9am. airport doesnt have cloakroom service and neither does vietnam airlines does early checkin. so you kinda get stuck wondering what to do incase you have a late evening flight from Da nang to anywhere.
area: Hòa Hải,Da Nang - View on map

name: Chicland Danang Beach Hotel
detail: This was my first time visiting Vietnam. Coming to Da Nang was a last minute choice and therefore, so was reserving a room at Chicland Hotel and doing so was the best decision I could have made. My partner and I never felt more welcomed and safe in a environment that wasn’t home. From the hospitality, the room and service, and the shear kindness from these host, made our trip much more memorable. If I’m ever in Da Nang again I will only book a room at Chicland Hotel.
area: Phước Mỹ,Da Nang - View on map

name: SALA DANANG BEACH HOTEL
detail: The concierge and driver team staff are very friendly and helpful! It’s quite and safe in room can’t hear any noice from outside. We have stayed in different hotel in Da Nang! I definitely recommend this hotel more than the other one! The facilities are new and modern. They offer cheese and ham, freeh fruit and salad, freshly made scramble eggs and noodles for breakfast. That is quite good for a complimentary breakfast. I don’t recommend to people who have high expectation for swimming pool, the pool is quite small but it’s good for instagram photo^^. The bed is comfy with hot bath tub! That’s wonderful stay with Sala DaNang hotel!
area: Phước Mỹ,Da Nang - View on map

name: Parosand Da Nang Hotel (Belle Maison Parosand Da Nang Hotel)
detail: Indeed, this is the best hotel in Da Nang. The welcome cocktail drink was arranged in 21st floor sky bar and this give us enjoyable moment for Da Nang beach view. The swimming pool size was not too big but enough for enjoying the infinity pool view and short break. Our kids like the sea view family room very much and the breakfast is good even for us as vegetarian. Although it is a bit pricey but it is really worth to spend at least a day or two here in this hotel. We really enjoyed staying this hotel and will come back again if we pay a visit to Da Nang.
area: Phước Mỹ,Da Nang - View on map
